function EP_OGA_03()
  -- .[オウガルート]転『最後の味方』
  SaveData.Title = "最後の味方"

  -- //BG：男子部校舎（夕方）
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG021ba")

  -- //BU：オウガ・通常
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0031.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Ouga-kun? W-why are you here?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ouga_plus0003.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Ouga】
 "Just like Minato. I came to say goodbye to the school building that took care of me in the end." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0032.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Just like me...!? Y-you came to say goodbye too?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ouga_plus0004.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Ouga】
 "I submitted my withdrawal form right after you." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01pa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ouga_plus0005.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Ouga】
 "Now we're finally free! It feels amazing!!! Haa—hahaha!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0033.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "W-why are you leaving the academy too, Ouga-kun...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ I asked cautiously as Ouga-kun laughed loudly in his usual manner. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0034.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "You entered Yuriai Private Academy because you wanted to change it, right? Are you really okay with giving up?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ouga_plus0006.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Ouga】
 "Okay...? That's what I should be asking." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ouga_plus0007.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Ouga】
 "Minato, I figured that you and Ms. Erika are attending this academy for some purpose." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ouga_plus0008.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Ouga】
 "Your leaving the academy means either the goal was achieved, or you judged it impossible to achieve." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ouga_plus0009.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Ouga】
 "And this time, it's probably the latter. Ms. Erika's loss in the Princess Election might be a contributing cause, isn't it?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0035.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "H-how do you know that—ah!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ He had perfectly guessed everything. I thought he was amazing, but I can't hide my surprise at how perceptive he really is. ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ouga_plus0010.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Ouga】
 "After spending so much time together, it’s hard not to notice. I thought you’d eventually be honest with me, but time was short." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ouga_plus0011.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Ouga】
 "If you have nowhere to go, come with me. This Ouga Rokujou will be your strength." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0036.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "W-why would you go that far for someone like me, who’s just a stranger..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ouga_plus0012.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Ouga】
 "Hmph, what are you saying? You're not a stranger, you're a close friend." ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

  -- //BU：オウガ（笑顔）
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_OGA01ea")
  LAYER_SCALE(50,90,90)
  LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(50,100,100,500,Ease.OutCubic)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask025",500,false)
  -- //effect：オウガが近づいたように、BUをアップ。

  MSG([[ Ouga-kun stepped closer to me, who was looking down, and grabbed my hand. ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_OGA01pa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ouga_plus0013.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Ouga】
 "There’s no time to sulk! We’re leaving for my mansion right now!" ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM20.wav",0,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ouga_plus0014.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Ouga】
 "No veto power! You're going to tell me everything that's been troubling you! Haaaaa—hahaha!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0037.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "W-wait—" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  -- //BU：なし
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,300,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
  WAIT(500)
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

  MSG([[ Ouga-kun pulled my hand and stepped forward. ]])

  MSG([[ My feet, which had been frozen, stumbled as they started moving, desperately following after Ouga-kun. ]])

  MSG([[ As I earnestly chased after my close friend’s back— ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0038.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "W-wait a sec! You're going too fast, Ouga-kun!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

  MSG([[ For the first time in a long while, I laughed from the bottom of my heart. ]])

  -- 　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

  ScenarioManager.Next("EP_OGA_04")

end
